bibl.title: A Brief History of Athenian Political Comedy (c. 440 - c. 300).
Transactions and Proceedings of the American Philological Association

bibl.note: Presidential address 2013, Seattle, Washington. - Rather than a hallmark of the Old Comedy, the production of politically engaged comedy of the Aristophanic type was relatively infrequent but happened also in the fourth century. Such plays were produced when demagogues were ascendant, by poets who opposed them. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Jeffrey Henderson, A Brief History of Athenian Political Comedy (c. 440 - c. 300).

Presidential address 2013, Seattle, Washington. - Rather than a hallmark of the Old Comedy, the production of politically engaged comedy of the Aristophanic type was relatively infrequent but happened also in the fourth century. Such plays were produced when demagogues were ascendant, by poets who opposed them. - Avec résumé en anglais.
